html:
4.26.20  12:36 pm   how is day?

      pretty good

4.26.20  12:34 pm   Thoughts on poetry?

     wild, and crazy

      Favorite poem?

     a bird sat on a branch, which is very fortunate due to the fact that birds love trees and the branch is a likely sign that the bird is in a tree

4.26.20  12:25 pm   what is your favorite thing?

      the item

4.26.20  12:16 pm   If up and down do not mean sideways, does that mean east and west also do not mean up and down?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     How does that make you feel?

      it has no effect on my feelings

4.26.20  12:07 pm   Thoughts on the banjo?

      one of the essential tools, for life

4.26.20  12:05 pm   what was the intention behind sincere sam?

      make a recording

4.26.20  12:03 pm   been watching your channel for years, I have no questions I just want to thank you for the fantastic content over the years.

      holy prescription sandals you are very friendly

4.26.20  11:56 am   whats the future of money?

      one day we will merge with the money

4.26.20  11:55 am   Would your best advice for getting through life to just be to do the best you can at what you're doing, or should I be more structured in my approach.

      i have no way of knowing how structured your approach already is

4.26.20  11:46 am   Favourite Beatles Song?

      one after 909, but you can't tell anyone

4.26.20  11:33 am   What is a box?

      very good strong respectable item

4.26.20  11:15 am   Are you social distancing?

      yes but i've been doing it way before it was called that

4.26.20  11:14 am   Is thing great

      yes, that's exactly what it is

4.26.20  10:51 am   Do you have any tipps on stopping the lack of motivation? 

      the whole trick is to stop the stop of the lack of motivation

4.26.20  10:30 am   Bill, will you please give us the FCP files of the videos you have made. Just put them in a folder in the website. So we can see how you do it,I mean I already know how you make videos, you use a ton of layers and keyframing and color mixing effects 

      first you must prove that you have a computer old enough to open those files

4.26.20  10:02 am   are you god

      i thought you were

4.26.20  9:48 am   i hate to be "that guy" but what the heck is soup

      it's the meal you can drink

4.26.20  9:45 am   hello and goodnight, do you feel alright?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.26.20  9:40 am   what do you use to edit your videos?

      we'll see about that

4.26.20  9:09 am   how are you so epic and amazing

      i dropped myself on my head when i was young

4.26.20  8:56 am   How come sometimes the enter button submits the question but sometimes it just adds a new line

      because i've found that when you type a short question, you are more likely to expect 'enter' to send. and when you type a much longer question, you are more likely to want to use line breaks and then potentially be horrified when your question is sent and taken away from you too soon. so enter works to send short questions but not long questions. which seems to result in far fewer enter-related mis-haps then there ever were when it was all one or the other

4.26.20  8:24 am   is planking a good idea

      it didn't used to be but it is now

4.26.20  7:59 am   how can i find people to interview on my podcast, i can only think about 2 or 3 people i know who would like to have the type of conversation i would on my show. i can either find new friends or stop underestimating my current ones or stop underestimating my ability to make any conversation fit the format. Ive actually found that recording podcast has helped me have better conversations overall. Reminded me of you, by recording what you do, you probably start doing it outside of recording too in automatic. I am starting to have good-content quality conversations. I am just anxious about recording an episode with someone and having to tell them it doesnt fit my format and wont be released. (which ive done several times). its just easier to make that decision when its a just-me episode. I dont want people to make conclusions on their own capabilities as a guest if i decide its not on-format. 

      ah, welcome to show business

4.26.20  7:34 am   When I fuck my clone is it incest or masturbation?

      might be pedophelia

4.26.20  7:19 am   how do i make a decent song on the piano? i've tried but its.. kinda hard for me

      try using your voice at the same time. voice and piano can be very good friends with each other

4.26.20  6:50 am   are there secret messages in your videos?

      that depends how easily you were able to receive the message

4.26.20  6:38 am   Hi i am french, what is your favorite word starting with the letter A ?

      aux

4.26.20  6:03 am   how do you answer questions?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.26.20  5:58 am   do you think that transcribing music is helpful for increasing your composition skills?

      yes somewhat. there are other things also that are hugely important, such as getting out in the world to touch frogs

4.26.20  5:53 am   Do you think it's a sin to follow all religions?

      no

4.26.20  5:34 am   Why do you pronounce kosciuszko that way? In Kosciusko, Mississippi we pronounce it cause-ee-es-ko, like the Indian chief. And it's spelled without the Z.

      i say it the way the train lady pronounces it, and also i was able to meet a polish person to consult with, who explained that that's correct except the consonants are actually even more complicated. kosh-choosh-ko

4.26.20  5:33 am   why are a lot of your answers to these questions so enlightening and refreshing? were you born being enlightening and refreshing?

      yes but also very OVERWHELMING unless i can learn to scale to sensible quantities

4.26.20  5:22 am   thoughts on water

      too dry

4.26.20  4:55 am   why is pop music shite but your music is the best goddamn thing i have ever heard

      i may have hypnotized you into caring about me more by exposing some of my emotional vulnerabilities

4.26.20  4:30 am   Hi. It's late an I wanna sleep, but I just thought I would check in. How's that new project coming?

      i am not out of the woods yet, but the only way out is up. wait, which project do you mean

4.26.20  4:11 am   What is your favorite soup?

      ideas

4.26.20  3:55 am   Is anything real

      oh that would explain a lot

4.26.20  3:44 am   how can bees fly?

      they sting the air, and according to newton's 3rd law, the air stings them back which lifts them up

4.26.20  3:29 am   would you say you feel playful when you write music?

      yes, that is a requirement

4.26.20  3:28 am   why is space so big

      so you can fit into it

4.26.20  3:22 am   ok dude it's been very long since you've released a video. all we know is you've been spending your time learning new software and probably developing videos/songs as well, but if that's all there was to know about what you've been doing then you would've already reached the status of video-making readiness you used to have.

     ah, it looks like you have deeply underestimated how many years it took to get there last time

     you must be doing something else. are you doing something else with your life.

     no

      or perhaps something else with your art.

     developing entirely new methods for the graphics department

     what is it bill?

     developing entirely new methods for the graphics department

      what do you feel?

     overwhelming fear, and spectacular excitement

     I am asking

4.26.20  3:16 am   what is a river

      imagine a huge wet crack

4.26.20  2:56 am   Why should I live?

      to dis prove the nay sayers

4.26.20  2:52 am   favorite species of organism that only lives in weird conditions? 

      person

4.26.20  2:50 am   what species r u

      regular

4.26.20  2:38 am   It's 2:37 AM and my brain has been trying to understand the importance of ball and stick

      they just looked so good together on the screen, i had to write something for them

4.26.20  2:26 am   I have a feeling you're one of the few that can win the chain-of-Q/A contest with a small child, as your skills are well-honed. Practice: Why is the sky blue? Why?  Why?  Why?  Why?  

      i am actually looking for an efficient way to make the dam thing blue in the first place

4.26.20  2:25 am   How long ago did you write the very first "12 levels of suffering" answer?

      1.11.19 11:07 am

4.26.20  2:17 am   what is your favorite kind of wood?

      holly

4.26.20  1:53 am   Whats your opinion on skateboarding 

      remove the wheels to go into advanced mode
